overview: Collective screening of the Academy Award nominated short films from the Animation category for 2015.  “The Bigger Picture,” Daisy Jacobs and Christopher Hees - 8 min,  “The Dam Keeper,” Robert Kondo and Dice Tsutsumi - 18 min,  “Feast,” Patrick Osborne and Kristina Reed - 6 min,  “Me and My Moulton,” Torill Kove - 14 min,  “A Single Life,” Joris Oprins - 3 min
title: 2015 Oscar Nominated Short Films: Animation
